item.description:
You are invited to the NorthShore MA pug meetup
When: The 2nd Saturday of every month (Outside meetings will not be held in the rain)
Time: 9:00am-11:00am
Where:
Fonzi, Sam & Ari's yard
404 Lynnfield Street
Lynn MA

The yard is fully enclosed so the pugs can run and play. However, we live on a very busy main street, so hold tight to your pug while coming into the yard.
Parking is allowed on the street.

Also if you are interested: Linda Kay, who is a Certified Master Groomer, has offered to come to the meetups and do puggy pampering treatments: Nail clipping, ear cleaning, wrinkle cleaning and a quick brush out for just $10.00 per pug. If you would like to get this done while you are at the meetup see Linda when you get there

meetup organizer: Jodi Webster
jwebster@mitre.org

Thanks everyone!

group.name: The Northshore MA Pug Meetup Group

item.name: Monthly Pug Meetup
